OOC: I was hoping to drag this out a little longer.  Oh well.

::Enertron
     The blast caught him completely aware that it was coming.  He 
also knew that he could do something about it.  He simply didn't.  He 
let the blast launch his ,now blackened, shell of a body a long 
distance crashing to the ground somewhere in the Great Plains where 
he lay dying amid the tall grass.
